name: lm-sensor-realtime
description: Point here is to try re-creating the graph from scratch With the end goal to be a large re-design potentially having data come in at real time, to be graphed, and simultaneously or after - inserted to the DB. I need a Node JS server running on my machine or in a docker container How this will work: server saves json output, parses to dict or whatever it calls it.  Then save it in a sensible way - perhaps in a dict of timestamp...? But I think I rather have a dict for each sensor????
